commit.message:
Fix bad commit for -fdec-math.

2016-10-11  Fritz Reese  <fritzoreese@gmail.com>

Fix bad commit for -fdec-math.

	* iresolve.c (get_radians, get_degrees): Fix sloppy commit.
	* simplify.c (degrees_f, radians_f): Ditto.

From-SVN: r241001

files.patch:
@@ -1,3 +1,8 @@

+	* simplify.c (degrees_f, radians_f): Ditto.
